lore: After Apollinaire raided the Columbia Tower, most of the Grimoires escaped from their bookshelves and spread across the continent. Those who remained hid everything they could in the basements to prevent looters from taking it.\n\nDespite the fact that the Pyro Grimoire's spells have changed over the years, they have always posed a fire risk. If a person without the necessary training uses it, their body will burst into flames.
menagerieDialog: I shall wreak havoc upon my enemies via a thousand papercuts!
There is a great number of books about battle strategy. A comprehensive review of such tomes would be of great help in your endeavors.
Nothing beats a warm fire, a fresh-cooked meal, and a good book.
(It's taking a nap, which conveniently makes it look like an ordinary book.)
name: Pyro Grimoire
